summary: Phase 1 completed: Ported soundness proof from Boneyard, fixed for reflexive temporal semantics. WeakCompleteness.lean is now sorry-free. Phases 2-4 deferred due to non-critical paths and architectural limitations. Phase 5 already complete (existing docs are comprehensive). Sorry count reduced from 33 to 32.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary documenting soundness port and sorry analysis

completion_data.completion_summary: Ported soundness proof from Boneyard to WeakCompleteness.lean, fixing reflexive semantics and adding T-axiom support. Reduced sorry count from 33 to 32. The main semantic_weak_completeness theorem remains sorry-free.
